sqls.sql:
SELECT S.*, N.entname_s nentname_s, E.entname_s eentname_s, S.created_by_s || U.USERNAME createname FROM AT_D_QM_SORTSTORAGELOG S, AT_D_EM_ENT E, AT_D_EM_ENT N, CORE_USER U WHERE S.SORTMACHINEBAR_S=E.ENTBARCODE_S(+) AND S.REALMACHINEBAR_S=N.ENTBARCODE_S(+) AND S.created_by_s=U.USERCODE(+) and S.RECORD_FLAG_S = 'A' <#if agenc_no_s??> and S.AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if arch_flag_s??> and S.ARCH_FLAG_S=:arch_flag_s </#if> <#if barcode_s??> and S.BARCODE_S like :barcode_s ||'%' </#if> <#if changed_by_s??> and S.CHANGED_BY_S=:changed_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and S.CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and S.CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and S.CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if>
<#if etype_i??> and S.ETYPE_I=:etype_i </#if> <#if gradecd_i??> and S.GRADECD_I=:gradecd_i </#if> <#if isok_i??> and S.ISOK_I=:isok_i </#if> <#if itemid_s??> and S.ITEMID_S like :itemid_s||'%' </#if> <#if proess_i??> and S.PROESS_I=:proess_i </#if> <#if realmachinebar_s??> and S.REALMACHINEBAR_S=:realmachinebar_s </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and S.RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if remark_s??> and S.REMARK_S=:remark_s </#if> <#if sortmachinebar_s??> and S.SORTMACHINEBAR_S=:sortmachinebar_s </#if>
<#if begin_created_time??> and to_char(S.SORTTIME_T,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss')> :begin_created_time </#if> <#if end_created_time??> and to_char(S.SORTTIME_T,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss')< :end_created_time </#if> <#if sorttype_i??> and S.SORTTYPE_I=:sorttype_i </#if>
<#if s_factory_s??> and S.S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if writeinremark_s??> and S.WRITEINREMARK_S=:writeinremark_s </#if> <#if writein_s??> and S.WRITEIN_S=:writein_s </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by S.SORTTIME_T desc </#if>

select count(1) FROM AT_D_QM_SORTSTORAGELOG S, AT_D_EM_ENT E, AT_D_EM_ENT N, CORE_USER U WHERE S.SORTMACHINEBAR_S=E.ENTBARCODE_S(+) AND S.REALMACHINEBAR_S=N.ENTBARCODE_S(+) AND S.created_by_s=U.USERCODE(+) and S.RECORD_FLAG_S = 'A' <#if agenc_no_s??> and S.AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if arch_flag_s??> and S.ARCH_FLAG_S=:arch_flag_s </#if> <#if barcode_s??> and S.BARCODE_S like :barcode_s ||'%' </#if> <#if changed_by_s??> and S.CHANGED_BY_S=:changed_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and S.CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and S.CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and S.CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if>
<#if etype_i??> and S.ETYPE_I=:etype_i </#if> <#if gradecd_i??> and S.GRADECD_I=:gradecd_i </#if> <#if isok_i??> and S.ISOK_I=:isok_i </#if> <#if itemid_s??> and S.ITEMID_S like :itemid_s||'%' </#if> <#if proess_i??> and S.PROESS_I=:proess_i </#if> <#if realmachinebar_s??> and S.REALMACHINEBAR_S=:realmachinebar_s </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and S.RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if remark_s??> and S.REMARK_S=:remark_s </#if> <#if sortmachinebar_s??> and S.SORTMACHINEBAR_S=:sortmachinebar_s </#if> <#if begin_created_time??> and to_char(S.SORTTIME_T,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss')> :begin_created_time </#if> <#if end_created_time??> and to_char(S.SORTTIME_T,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss')< :end_created_time </#if> <#if sorttype_i??> and S.SORTTYPE_I=:sorttype_i </#if>
<#if s_factory_s??> and S.S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if writeinremark_s??> and S.WRITEINREMARK_S=:writeinremark_s </#if> <#if writein_s??> and S.WRITEIN_S=:writein_s </#if>
